item.description:
Hey everyone! The Boston/Providence Single Parent Meetup Group is having a party and we're invited! Those of us who were lucky enough to go to Monica's luau know how much fun we can expect to have! Sandy and Andy are organizers and are planning the menu, so please email Joanne to let her know what you can bring. She can work with them. Here's their write up:

UPDATE 6/25/08: Bring a bathing suit!

Monica will setup a sprinkler and a water table for the kids to play with. I'll come up with some water related games as well. There is a field down the street if we decide that the kids need to expend some energy playing soccer or kickball.

Please keep your RSVP's updated!

--
UPDATE 6/20/08: I am starting a food list for the BBQ. I'm asking that all families that come bring enough of one item for all attending. Please add which food you'll be bringing from the following list or if you're bringing something else.

potato salad (Scott)
mac salad (Scott)
chips (Susana)
drinks (Susana)
paper goods (Monica)
buns, hot dogs, burgers (Andy)
condiments (Andy)
baked goods/dessert (Amy)

Also, there is a 4th Of July parade that morning. Monica welcomes everyone to come early, park at her house and walk to the parade. The parade starts at 9am and may close some roads so detailed directions will be provided. You can read more about the parade here: http://natick4th.org/....

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: 4th of July Party at Monica's!
